sentences.sContent: the deprived sections of the urban population
sentences.sCn: 城市人口中的贫困群体

sentences.sContent: ...the right urban mix has propped up home occupancy increased property values...
...with the rise of a new concept in urban planning that aims to make life easier and more convenient...
...a diverse and vigorous economy attracted to the urban core has offered stable employment for residents...
...There is a large potential for wastewater agriculture to both help and hurt great numbers of urban consumers...
...The report focused on poor urban areas...
...those dangers are outweighed by the social and economic gains for poor urban farmers and consumers who need affordable food...
...while the free water and nutrients from human waste can help urban farmers in developing countries to escape poverty...
...disease and spectacular poverty that those same migrants must often at first endure when they become urban dwellers...
...His main thesis is that the buzz of urban life...
...that the wave of urbanization isn't just about the migration of people into urban environments...
...We're headed towards an urban planet no matter what...
...The rapid expansion of urban areas will have a huge impact on biodiversity hotspots and on carbon emissions in those urban areas...
...or at least not as much as in the large urban areas...
...Modern urban life in rich countries is not well adapted to large families...

城市扩张；都市向郊区扩张的现象
